definitions.definition: An obligation , debt or responsibility owed to someone.

subdefinitions.definition: Any item recorded on the right-hand side of a balance sheet .

definitions.definition: A handicap that holds something back, a drawback , someone or something that is a burden to whoever is required to take care of them; a person or action that exposes others to greater risk .

subdefinitions.definition: A person on a team that is more of a hindrance than a help .

definitions.definition: The condition of being susceptible to something.

main_definition: An obligation , debt or responsibility owed to someone.
secondary_definitions: A handicap that holds something back, a drawback , someone or something that is a burden to whoever is required to take care of them; a person or action that exposes others to greater risk .
The condition of being susceptible to something.
